 `D = BlockBandedMatrix(Zeros(9,6),fill(3,3),fill(2,3),(0,0));` to create a 9x6 matrix consisting of three diagonal blocks. I want to fill the diagonal blocks with entries of another array `Λ0` using the `map` function, so something like
 `D = map(j -> D[Block(j,j)] = Λ0[:,:,j], [1,2,3])` . I don't think I am doing it right. What's the right way to proceed? Thanks!
